example.text: With over 5M illegal crossings since Biden took office, our nation is facing an unprecedented border crisis that will only be made worse by the end of Title 42. [[user]] is taking action this week by bringing HR 2 to the floor to empower [[user]] with the resources they need. [[url]]

Andrew Helps Introduce Bill To Address Veteran Homelessness This week, Andrew joined with Congresswoman Nikema Williams to introduce the Return Home to Housing Act , bipartisan legislation that addresses veteran homelessness. The Return Home to Housing Act will raise the maximum allowable rate that the Department of Veterans Affairs can reimburse to service providers for supplying transitional housing to homeless veterans.

CASEWORK HIGHLIGHT: Cleaning Up Local USPS Office Our office received complaints about a local USPS office which had been littered. Andrew's casework team worked with the post office to ensure that the mess was cleaned up and would no longer detract from the community.

The Metropolitan Police Department (MPD) faces a historic staffing shortage and has struggled to recruit new officers...' For years Democrats in Washington and New York have vilified law enforcement - gutting morale, enacting policies that prevent officers from effectively doing their jobs, and inciting violent anti-police sentiment,' Garbarino told the Caller. 'Dedicated public servants are resigning in record numbers due to the current policing environment with very few willing to take their place.
Without it, federal, state, and local law enforcement will be stretched beyond their limits, and threats to our national security will inevitably multiply." Read the full letter here .

It was a pleasure to meet with Bulgaria's Prosecutor General Ivan Geshev in DC this week to discuss the Black Sea Security Act, legislation to prevent the further spread of armed conflict in the region. [[url]]

Weekly Newsletter from the Office of Congressman Andrew Garbarino If you were forwarded this email, click here to subscribe ? An update from the office of Congressman Andrew Garbarino SPOTLIGHT VA Works To Raise Awareness About Expanded Benefits Available Under PACT Act The US Department of Veteran Affairs is working to raise awareness about expanded access to benefits for veterans with service related toxic exposure following the passage of the PACT Act, which Andrew was proud to support.
